attributes.action: not backslide on yet another promise he made and hold a referendum on the EU constitution whatever it is called and not use weasel words to avoid it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you call a leopard or a tiger a 'pussey cat' when the crunch comes it is still a leopard or a tiger and the same applies to the constitution whatever the Germans and you try to call it. We therefore think we should have a referandum before you, not the government, commit us to something we do not want. I did think that was democracy but what you are now proposing is dictatorship.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
